options.content:
# ðŸ›ï¸ Category Spending Dashboard - Spending Pattern Analysis

**What This Dashboard Shows:** Analyzes spending patterns across expense categories with trend identification to help control spending.

**Key Metrics Explained:**
â€¢ **Top 10 Categories:** Highest spending areas with month-over-month percentage changes
â€¢ **Spending Trends:** 2-year patterns showing seasonal and structural changes
â€¢ **Variance Analysis:** Current spending vs 3-month averages to identify unusual patterns
â€¢ **Category Changes:** Month-over-month increases >20% warrant investigation

**How to Use:** Monitor largest categories first as they have biggest impact. Look for trend changes over 3+ months rather than single-month spikes.

panels.description: Top spending categories from the most recent complete month, showing percentage change compared to the previous month

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest_months AS (
  SELECT 
    budget_year_month,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY budget_year_month DESC) as rn
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends 
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
  GROUP BY budget_year_month
  LIMIT 2
),
month_labels AS (
  SELECT 
    (SELECT budget_year_month FROM latest_months WHERE rn = 1) as current_month,
    (SELECT budget_year_month FROM latest_months WHERE rn = 2) as prior_month
),
current_month AS (
  SELECT 
    level_1_category,
    SUM(monthly_spending) as current_amount
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends cst
  JOIN latest_months lm ON cst.budget_year_month = lm.budget_year_month
  WHERE lm.rn = 1
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
    AND monthly_spending > 0
  GROUP BY level_1_category
),
prior_month AS (
  SELECT 
    level_1_category,
    SUM(monthly_spending) as prior_amount
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends cst
  JOIN latest_months lm ON cst.budget_year_month = lm.budget_year_month
  WHERE lm.rn = 2
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
    AND monthly_spending > 0
  GROUP BY level_1_category
)
SELECT 
  CONCAT(cm.level_1_category, 
    CASE 
      WHEN COALESCE(pm.prior_amount, 0) = 0 THEN CONCAT(' (New in ', (SELECT current_month FROM month_labels), ')')
      ELSE CONCAT(' (', 
        CASE 
          WHEN ((cm.current_amount - COALESCE(pm.prior_amount, 0)) / COALESCE(pm.prior_amount, 1)) * 100 >= 0 THEN '+'
          ELSE ''
        END,
        ROUND(((cm.current_amount - COALESCE(pm.prior_amount, 0)) / COALESCE(pm.prior_amount, 1)) * 100, 1)::text, 
        '% vs ', (SELECT prior_month FROM month_labels), ')')
    END
  ) as metric,
  ROUND(cm.current_amount, 0) as value
FROM current_month cm
LEFT JOIN prior_month pm ON cm.level_1_category = pm.level_1_category
CROSS JOIN month_labels
ORDER BY cm.current_amount DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Top 10 Spending Categories with MoM Change

targets.rawSql:
WITH top_categories AS (
    SELECT level_1_category
    FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends 
    WHERE transaction_year >= EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_TRUNC('year', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 year'))
    AND budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
      AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
      AND monthly_spending > 0
    GROUP BY level_1_category
    ORDER BY SUM(monthly_spending) DESC
    LIMIT 6
  )
  SELECT 
    CONCAT(budget_year_month, '-01')::timestamp as time,
    level_1_category as metric,
    SUM(monthly_spending) as value
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends 
  WHERE transaction_year >= EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_TRUNC('year', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 year'))
    AND budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
    AND monthly_spending > 0
    AND level_1_category IN (SELECT level_1_category FROM top_categories)
  GROUP BY budget_year_month, level_1_category
  ORDER BY time, level_1_category;

WITH top_categories AS (
    SELECT level_1_category
    FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends 
    WHERE transaction_year >= EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_TRUNC('year', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 year'))
    AND budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
      AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
      AND monthly_spending > 0
    GROUP BY level_1_category
    ORDER BY SUM(monthly_spending) DESC
    LIMIT 8
  )
  SELECT 
    CONCAT(budget_year_month, '-01')::timestamp as time,
    level_1_category as metric,
    SUM(monthly_spending) as value
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends 
  WHERE transaction_year >= EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_TRUNC('year', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '2 years'))
    AND budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
    AND monthly_spending > 0
    AND level_1_category IN (SELECT level_1_category FROM top_categories)
  GROUP BY budget_year_month, level_1_category
  ORDER BY time, level_1_category;

SELECT 
  CAST(transaction_year as text) as year,
  SUM(monthly_spending) as amount
FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends 
WHERE transaction_year >= EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE_TRUNC('year', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '5 years'))
  AND transaction_year < EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE)
  AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
  AND monthly_spending > 0
GROUP BY transaction_year
ORDER BY transaction_year;

WITH current_month AS (
  SELECT 
    level_1_category,
    SUM(monthly_spending) as current_amount
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends 
  WHERE budget_year_month = (
    SELECT MAX(budget_year_month) FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends 
    WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
  )
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
    AND monthly_spending > 0
  GROUP BY level_1_category
),
rolling_averages AS (
  SELECT 
    level_1_category,
    SUM(rolling_3m_avg_spending) as avg_3m_spending
  FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends 
  WHERE budget_year_month = (
    SELECT MAX(budget_year_month) FROM reporting.rpt_category_spending_trends 
    WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE), 'YYYY-MM')
  )
    AND level_1_category NOT IN ('Uncategorized', 'Bank Transaction', 'Salary')
    AND monthly_spending > 0
  GROUP BY level_1_category
)
SELECT 
  cm.level_1_category as category,
  CASE 
    WHEN cm.current_amount > ra.avg_3m_spending THEN cm.current_amount - ra.avg_3m_spending
    ELSE 0
  END as "Above Average",
  CASE 
    WHEN cm.current_amount < ra.avg_3m_spending THEN ra.avg_3m_spending - cm.current_amount
    ELSE 0
  END as "Below Average"
FROM current_month cm
JOIN rolling_averages ra ON cm.level_1_category = ra.level_1_category
WHERE ABS(cm.current_amount - ra.avg_3m_spending) > 50
ORDER BY ABS(cm.current_amount - ra.avg_3m_spending) DESC
LIMIT 10;
